description:
Stuart, FL

The Treasure Coast's Top Personal Injury Firm

Serving Martin County and the surrounding areas of Florida's Treasure Coast, David Golden, P.A., in Stuart, Florida, offers a full range of personal injury services to help those who suffered an injury or loss caused by someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Experienced, Award-Winning Counsel

Having practiced law for more than 25 years, our law firm's founder, attorney David Golden, has earned a reputation as one of the region's top personal injury attorneys. By working closely with those he serves and advocating strongly on their behalf to secure the maximum amount possible, Mr. Golden holds a perfect rating from Avvo, and he won the site's Clients' Choice Award for personal injury in both 2014 and 2015.

He also holds an AV Preeminent peer review rating* from Martindale-Hubbell, so you can trust you will receive the highest level of advocacy and support possible from an ethical attorney totally devoted to protecting your rights and interests.

Focused On Your Needs

When working with our law firm, you will receive first-class service directly from an attorney dedicated to helping you and your family recover the compensation you need for medical bills, lost wages and other related expenses.

Whether your claim is the result of a car accident, a truck accident, a motorcycle or boating accident, an accident that occurred on someone else's property, or any other similar act of negligence or wrongdoing, we will sit with you and discuss your options to reduce the amount of stress and confusion you likely feel. Then, we will work to build the strongest case possible to help you secure the finances you need to support yourself and your family during your difficult time.

For more information concerning your situation, you can contact our law office to schedule a consultation. At David Golden, P.A., we are fully prepared to assist you in any way we can, and you will not have to pay a fee unless we successfully obtain a recovery on your behalf.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
